demo.title: Synology Demo
demo.subtitle: Manage your synology NAS
demo.description_line_1: Welcome to the Synology Download Extension. Most of the functionalities available in the full extension are replicated in this interactive simulation.
demo.description_line_2: To know more, have a look at our dedicated page, go to github or add it to your navigator
demo.button_title: Try adding a task or download
demo.button_description: To emulate new task or download events, please use the buttons below
